paper.title: Ray-shooting and isotopy classes of lines in 3-dimensional space
paper.venue: Workshop on Algorithms and Data Structures
paper.abstract: A uniform approach to problems involving lines in 3-dimensional space is presented. This approach is based on mapping lines in R3 into points and hyperplanes in 5-dimensional projective space (Plucker space).
